snippet.title: Footsies - Arcade Mode Longplay
snippet.description:
FOOTSIES Rollback Edition Arcade Mode Playthrough / Longplay / Gameplay.

0:00 Player vs. Spammer
0:58 Player vs. Blocker
1:57 Player vs. Ordinaryguy
2:50 Player vs. Whiffpunisher
4:20 Player vs. Onehitman
5:17 Player vs. Rollbacker
6:14 Ending

Footsies Move List: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FhamFMI8BJg

FOOTSIES is a 2D fighting game with simple commands, but with the fundamentals of fighting games. It can be played for free and can also be purchased in a full version on Steam / Google Play / Apple Store / Amazon App. The full version has:

• Arcade Mode
• Offline versus mode (player/cpu)
• Online versus mode (rollback netcode, pc-mobile crossplay)
• Online lobby (up to 10 players, chat, spectators)
• Training mode
• Command list with frame data
• Hitbox viewer
• Hit Confirm, Whiff Punish, and Parry Minigames
• Character Customization

Developer Channel: https://www.youtube.com/@HiFightTH

The video is edited, I cut the matches I missed, hence the time difference on the clock. I do this in every video.

#footsies
